Giga Fitness Club offers and guarantees you the best fitness in Morocco at Low-Cost prices: A large Moroccan network of gyms equipped with state-of-the-art machines, professional coaches who are always at your service and a value for money unmatched. 

Giga Fitness Club is truly the leader in fitness and fitness in Morocco.
All Giga Fitness Club gyms, everywhere in Morocco, are designed on more than 1000m² up to 6500m², in order to offer you the necessary space so that your sessions are a pleasant and privileged moment, and to practice sport in the best conditions.

 You will find a bodybuilding area with the latest generation equipment and machines, a cardio training area and another area dedicated to water aerobics.
At Giga Fitness Club, and even if the prices are low-cost, you will find high quality, efficient and easy to use machines at your disposal.


Giga Fitness club rooms are located in (Agadir, Casablanca, Rabat, Oujda and Tangier)
